verses.roman:
nṛsiṁhera haila jāni āji upavāsa
ṭhākura upavāsī rahe, jiye kaiche dāsa?'

synonyms: nṛsiṁhera—of Lord Nṛsiṁha; haila—there was; jāni—I understand; āji—today; upavāsa—fasting; ṭhākura upavāsī rahe—the master remains fasting; jiye kaiche dāsa—how can the servant sustain his life.
translation: "I think that Nṛsiṁhadeva could not eat anything today, and therefore He is fasting. If the master fasts, how can the servant live?"
